bibl.title: Hellenica Oxyrhynchia. Edited with Translation and Commentary.
bibl.note: Reproduisent le texte des éditions de: Vittorio Bartoletti, Hellenica Oxyrhynchia (Leipzig, 1959); - Ludwig Koenen, StPap 15 (1976) pp. 39-79.
bibl.seg: MacKechnie P.R. and S.J. Kern, Hellenica Oxyrhynchia. Edited with Translation and Commentary.
Warminster, Aris and Phillips, 1988, 8°, iv-187 pp., 7 cartes.
Reproduisent le texte des éditions de: Vittorio Bartoletti, Hellenica Oxyrhynchia (Leipzig, 1959); - Ludwig Koenen, StPap 15 (1976) pp. 39-79.

C.R. par Patrice Cauderlier, REG 103 (1990) pp. 330-331. - Ronald A. Knox, CR N.S., 40 (1990) pp. 231-232. - Alain Martin, AntCl 59 (1990) pp. 464-465. - Jean A. Straus, EtCl 58 (1990) pp. 412-413. - C.J. Tuplin, LCM 14 (1989) pp. 157-160. - Detlef Lotze, Klio 76 (1994) p. 476. - Wolfgang Luppe, Mnemosyne 4a s., 45 (1992) pp. 109-110.
